meanings.definition: To bring together again after being apart.
meanings.sent1: The family is reuniting for a special dinner tonight.
meanings.sent2: After a long journey, the lost dog is reuniting with its owner.
meanings.sent3: The puzzle pieces are reuniting to complete the picture.
meanings.sent4: The scattered clouds are reuniting to form a storm.
meanings.sent5: The separated friends are reuniting with laughter and hugs.

meanings.definition: The act of coming together again.
meanings.sent1: The reuniting of old friends brought joy to everyone.
meanings.sent2: The reuniting of the two rival groups led to peace in the community.
meanings.sent3: The reuniting of the lost socks in the laundry was a mystery.
meanings.sent4: The reuniting of the stars in the night sky created a beautiful constellation.
meanings.sent5: The reuniting of the broken pieces formed a complete vase.
